2fa_approve_add_user_message: Click accept to approve add user behavior
2fa_approve_sender_transaction_message: Accept to approve API withdrawal request
2fa_approve_change_password_message: You sent a request to change password, accept if the request was sent by youself, and then change it on webite
2fa_approve_user_login_message: Click accept to approve the login behavior when you make sure the login device and os is correct
2fa_backup_answer_hint: Please keep the answer in mind, you will need it when restore key
2fa_backup_key_message: You sent a request to backup key, accept and input pin if the request was sent by youself, the backup file will be sent to your email
2fa_create_mappedwallet_message: Input PIN to create mapped wallet
2fa_create_mappedwallet_title: Create Wallet - with mapped wallet address
2fa_create_outgoing_address_message: Click accept to approve add outgoing address behavior
2fa_create_batch_wallet_message: Input PIN to create batch wallet
2fa_restore_key_message: You sent a request to restore key, accept and input pin if the request was sent by youself
2fa_telegram_bot_integration_message: Please open cybavo auth to bind with your telegram account
2fa_unfroze_wallet_message: Operator will be able to do transaction
2fa_set_collection_policy_message: Change wallet collection policy as you set on WEB
2fa_del_collection_policy_message: Remove wallet collection policy in the wallet
2fa_del_sender_policy_message: Remove wallet collection policy in the wallet
2fa_set_sender_policy_message: Change wallet withdraw policy as you set on WEB
2fa_wallet_collection_policy_detail_fee_: Auto fee, lower bound is {{.fee_low}}, upper bound is {{.fee_up}}, add on is {{.fee_dev}}
2fa_change_risk_control_message: Change risk control config as you set on WEB
2fa_change_sofa_config_message: Change Withdraw/Deposit wallet config as you set on WEB
2fa_bnb_memo_flag_message: Please be noticed, turn on or off BNB memo flag will cost 1 BNB from the wallet
2fa_trustline_message: Creates, updates, or deletes a trustline
2fa_utxo_aggregation_message: Approve to merge UTXOs to larger one
2fa_create_sofa_wizard_title: Allow sofa wizard to create wallet
2fa_create_sofa_wizard_message: Allow sofa wizard to create wallet and related configuration
2fa_call_abi_message: Accept to approve contract ABI request

user_login_fail_telegram:
[Security alert] Login fail too many times

Dear {{.user}}, you just tried to login with wrong password too many times, so the system locked the login behavior. You can unlock by email.

[Security alert] {{.user}} login fail too many times

Dear {{.admin}}, {{.user}}({{.email}}) just tried to login with wrong password too many times, so the system locked the login behavior.
